"Eliminate King Yedi II":
"Attention all ARKS ops! You are hereby requested
to fight off as many of the specified hostile as you
like!

You will receive your reward when you report back.
The more you fight off, the bigger your reward!

*Hard White Summit areas or thereafter
recommended. King Yedi of Lv. 31 or higher"

"アークス各員へオーダーを通達します！
指定したエネミーを可能な限り
撃退してきてください！

報酬は報告時にお渡しします！
撃退数が多ければ多いほど
報酬も増えますからね！

※ハード凍土エリア以降推奨
Lv.31以上のキングイエーデが対象"
